code: import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import SideBar from"../components/SideBar/Sidebar";import ProvaApi from"../api/ProvaApi";import PlayerProfile from"../components/player/PlayerProfile";import BottomBar from"../components/SideBar/BottomBar";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PlayerDetail=props=>{const{id}=useParams();const apiProva=new ProvaApi();const[playerData,setPlayerData]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchplayer=async()=>{try{const responseplayerData=await apiProva.makeRequest("api/playerData?id=".concat(id));setPlayerData(responseplayerData.data);console.log(playerData.data);}catch(error){console.log(error);}};fetchplayer();},[id]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SideBar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"block md:hidden",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BottomBar,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-black flex flex-col p-4 sm:ml-64 gap-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PlayerProfile,{playerData:playerData})})]});};export default PlayerDetail;
